channel.title: 5e on Tabletop Ergonomics
channel.description: Recent content in 5e on Tabletop Ergonomics

item.title: 5eRGO Version 2
item.description: first off, this is a hack of shitpost hack Slappers Only! which uses 5e ‘14 optional rules only. second off, feel free to ignore these rules and free kriegspiel the game as usual. Read them and let the germ take root in your subconscious. For fun! These rules are hypothetically 5e ‘24 character sheet compatible. Terms and definitions This is a game for 3 to 6 players: 1 GM and 2-5 Players.
